item.title: Project Flying Robot: Supporting The Blimpduino
item.description: As Maker Faire approached, my brother Damen and I were very busy working on something cool: support for the now-shipping Blimpduino kit! Thanks to the tireless efforts of Chris Anderson and Jordi Mu√±oz, the long awaited Blimpduino kit is now shipping at Makershed. As readers of this blog know, we have drawn a lot of inspiration from the Blimpduino. Now, we actually have 2 of them, and you can get your own.
